alert.note: Alert for Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:58AM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... A Levee Failure on the Cache River in... Northwestern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... * Until noon CST. * At 758 AM CST, local law enforcement reported a levee on the Cache River at Near Pitts, AR failed causing flash flooding of immediately surrounding areas. HAZARD...Flash flooding from a levee failure. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flooding of areas near the levee break. * Locations affected include Pitts, Arkansas This includes the following streams and drainages... Cache River, Flag Slough Ditch and Willow Ditch. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED LEVEE FAILURE...OCCURRING
info.instruction: If you are in low lying areas along the you should move to higher ground immediately. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
